name: Interstellar Guardian
description:
The year is 2XXX.

For the first time in recorded history, Mankind has found Alien Life.

Or rather, they found us first.

You are humanity's last guardian, their savior. Protect the Earth from the evil Surge and try to stay alive!

Interstellar Guardian was developed, designed and published by Emmet, an independent game developer. He enjoys playing music and learning about physics in his spare time.
